programme.title: The Blackheath Poisonings
programme.desc: Part two of three. Investigations into Roger's death cause members of the family to act strangely - and another suspicious death upsets the situation further. Christine Kavanagh, Zoe Wanamaker and Julia St John star

programme.title: The Young Ones (1961)
programme.desc: A clean-cut teenager tries to save his youth club from a greedy tycoon who wants to demolish it and build an office block by recording a hit pop single. Musical, starring Cliff Richard, Robert Morley, Melvyn Hayes, Richard O'Sullivan and Carole Gray and the rest of the Shadows. Including FYI Daily

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: There's much excitement in Aidensfield as Lord Ashfordly returns home with his new wife, and the villagers are pleasantly surprised to discover how glamorous and charming she is. However, a series of violent hijackings leaves the newlyweds shaken and in need of protection from Mike - but the intrepid officer's suspicions are aroused by the blushing bride's odd behaviour

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike joins forces with Scotland Yard when a gang of thieves turns up in Aidensfield, apparently plotting to steal a valuable horse from local trainer Kieron Doyle. The heroic copper doggedly pursues his quarry to the detriment of his relationship with Tricia - but tragedy strikes, leaving him heartbroken

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The duo are hired to cure a patchy lawn at a select language school hiding dark secrets. The disappearance of a Polish student alerts them to a tale of passion, rivalry and revenge, and when a handyman is found with his throat cut they race to find the killer. Drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: The mysterious death of a former police commissioner forces a reluctant Morse to team up with old professional rival Chief Inspector Dawson. As they and Sergeant Lewis begin to investigate, a link is uncovered to the unsolved case of a girl murdered 18 years previously. John Thaw stars, with Kevin Whately, Kenneth Colley and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: The sleuthing spinster teams up with a dashing man to investigate a series of poison-pen letters in the sleepy village of Lymstock. Two of the missives have led to suicides - but Miss Marple suspects there is more to the deaths than meets the eye. Murder mystery with an all-star cast, featuring Geraldine McEwan, James D'Arcy, Emilia Fox, Imogen Stubbs and Ken Russell

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Hathaway and Lewis investigate the death of a maintenance engineer found shot in the head in the basement of the Bodleian Library. A search of the man's house reveals a stash of valuable volumes and a connection to the local Gamblers Anonymous group, and the detectives go on to expose a scam involving two Oxford academics. Drama, guest starring Neil Pearson and Haydn Gwynne, with Kevin Whately and Laurence Fox

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A young woman asks Poirot to investigate her father's murder - a 14-year-old crime for which her mother was found guilty and executed. The detective agrees to investigate, but warns his client that he may discover things she does not want to hear. David Suchet stars, with Rachael Stirling, Aidan Gillen, Aimee Mullens, Toby Stephens, Gemma Jones, Patrick Malahide and Annette Badland

programme.title: The Best of the Royal Variety
programme.desc: A look at the speciality acts that have appeared over the years, including ventriloquists, acrobats, magicians and performance artists. With contributions by Keith Harris, the Krankies, Bernie Clifton, the Caesar Twins and the Umbilical Brothers

programme.title: Steptoe and Son Ride Again (1973)
programme.desc: Rag-and-bone man Harold invests his father Albert's life savings in buying a racing greyhound. However, the dog is in no fit state to compete, and after a disastrous debut, the hapless pair end up heavily in debt. Wily Harold soon has another plan to get the money they need - involving faking Albert's death. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Harry H Corbett , Wilfrid Brambell and Diana Dors. Including FYI Daily

programme.title: The Vice
programme.desc: As Joe returns to the Vice Unit, his first job is to nail a violent pimp - a case he doesn't think is going to stretch him too much. However, the operation runs into difficulties when the mother of one of the prostitutes involved recognises Vickers and threatens to expose some of his extracurricular activities unless he deals with the case personally. Gritty drama, starring David Harewood and Tim Pigott-Smith

programme.title: Trial & Retribution
programme.desc: Conclusion. Maryna stands trial for her attack on Malikov and claims she was acting in self defence, while Walker pays the price for his insensitive handling of the case. Connor takes another look at Sofia's murder, considering whether Walker's obsession with pinning the crime on Malikov has led the team down the wrong path. Crime drama, starring David Hayman and Victoria Smurfit

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Moriarty seeks revenge on Holmes for foiling his plan to sell the Mona Lisa, and the pair ultimately fight their final battle at the Reichenbach Falls in Switzerland. Jeremy Brett stars as the titular hero, with David Burke making his final appearance as Dr Watson and Eric Porter as Moriarty. Last in the series

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: A patient who set fire to his own shop (guest star Tony Slattery) attempts to avoid police questioning by leaping into an ambulance and driving off towards the pier - unaware Alun and a sick man are in the back of the vehicle. programme.desc: A wealthy banker goes missing while walking from his country house to the village post office. programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: William decides to take Mary's advice and lose a few pounds, while the object of his affections is relieved to be given another chance at work, on the condition that she make herself available for night calls. It's a busy time at the funeral parlour, as three teenagers are killed in a car accident, and Molly seizes the opportunity to move closer to her daughter. Romantic drama, starring Martin Clunes, Julie Graham and Cheryl Campbell

programme.title: Scott & Bailey
programme.desc: Rachel has a lucky escape while walking home when she narrowly avoids being hit by a car. Shaken, she starts pursuing the driver, who has fled on foot, and the next day she suspects the incident was an attempted murder - and that Nick may be involved. As she tries to deal with the revelation, Janet is left to take charge of the latest case - the gang shooting of a teenager whose friend is a key witness. Detective drama, starring Lesley Sharp and Suranne Jones

programme.title: The Vice
programme.desc: Vickers goes undercover in a pole-dancing club thought to be the front for a prostitution racket, but he has to call on all his guile and cunning to get himself off the hook after Joe begins to realise his boss is in collusion with the chief suspect. Gritty drama, starring Tim Pigott-Smith, David Harewood and Caroline Catz

programme.title: Steptoe and Son (1972)
programme.desc: Rag-and-bone man Harold breaks away from his father for long enough to marry a glamorous stripper - but makes the short-sighted decision of letting his dishevelled dad tag along on their honeymoon. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Harry H Corbett, Wilfrid Brambell, Carolyn Seymour and Victor Maddern

programme.title: Life with Judy Garland
programme.desc: Part two of two. Judy Davis stars in the conclusion of the two-part drama charting the turbulent personal life of the legendary star, focusing on how years of dependence on prescription drugs and alcohol eventually took their toll. Hugh Laurie, Victor Garber, Tammy Blanchard and Alison Pill star. Based on the memoirs of Judy's daughter, Lorna Luft

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Mystery, starring Geraldine McEwan as the genteel sleuth. A woman experiences an unsettling vision after moving into the home of her dreams - and it transpires she lived in the house as a child. Miss Marple investigates the history of the property and discovers it was connected with a baffling disappearance years before - which has never been solved. With Dawn French, Russ Abbot, Geraldine Chaplin, Phil Davis and Sarah Parish

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: The inspector and his sidekick DS Hathaway investigate the murder of a talented maths student. The prime suspect is the victim's ex-boyfriend, who is convinced his uncle has set him up, but old case papers belonging to Morse reveal the boy's family is hiding a dark secret. Laurence Fox and Rebecca Front co-star alongside Kevin Whately

programme.title: The Young Ones (1961)
programme.desc: A clean-cut teenager tries to save his youth club from a greedy tycoon who wants to demolish it and build an office block by recording a hit pop single. Musical, starring Cliff Richard, Robert Morley, Melvyn Hayes, Richard O'Sullivan and Carole Gray and the rest of the Shadows

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A starlet engaged to marry a foreign prince becomes the police's number one suspect in the murder of a shady producer. Desperate to ensure she escapes prosecution, her wealthy fiance asks Poirot to catch the real killer. Unfortunately, the celebrated detective ends up concluding she has lied - or is an accomplice. David Suchet stars, with Niamh Cusack, Abigail Cruttenden and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: The mysterious death of a former police commissioner forces a reluctant Morse to team up with old professional rival Chief Inspector Dawson. As they and Sergeant Lewis begin to investigate, a link is uncovered to the unsolved case of a girl murdered 18 years previously. John Thaw stars, with Kevin Whately, Kenneth Colley and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The duo are hired to cure a patchy lawn at a select language school hiding dark secrets. The disappearance of a Polish student alerts them to a tale of passion, rivalry and revenge, and when a handyman is found with his throat cut they race to find the killer. Drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Louisa faces off with love rival Carrie in a battle for Martin's affections, and romance is in the air for Aunt Joan, who gains an admirer in the form of Edward. Elsewhere, Al makes a surprise reappearance and PC Penhale celebrates his birthday. Martin Clunes stars, with Joe Absolom and Louise Delamere

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The detective investigates the murder of social worker Jenny Lister, but figuring out the motive behind the killing of an apparently popular woman proves difficult. However, an infamous past case involving the death of a child appears to hold the key. In her pursuit of the truth, Vera uncovers the failings of an understaffed care system and discovers the secret at the heart of Jenny's death - which the killer will stop at nothing to protect. Drama based on the book by Ann Cleeves, starring Brenda Blethyn and David Leon

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: First of a two-part episode of the popular crime drama, in which the disappearance of an ambitious surgeon keeps Frost and new partner DS Reid busy, especially when it transpires quite a few people have cause to want her out of the way. On the personal front, a mysterious woman arrives on Frost's doorstep with some startling news regarding his past. Starring David Jason, Bruce Alexander, Robert Glenister and Arkie Whiteley

Romantic comedy, starring Steve Martin, Goldie Hawn, Dana Delany, Donald Moffat and Julie Harris

Murder mystery with an all-star cast, featuring Geraldine McEwan, James D'Arcy, Emilia Fox, Imogen Stubbs and Ken Russell

Drama, guest starring Neil Pearson and Haydn Gwynne, with Kevin Whately and Laurence Fox

programme.title: Snowtrapped
programme.desc: From avalanches to in-car burials, this documentary tells seven stories of people who became trapped by snow. Real-life footage brings to life how some survived against both the odds and the elements, how some were found despite having no means of communicating with the outside world, and how others were not so lucky. Including film from the helmet camera of skier Kristoffer Carlsson, who was buried alive under two metres of snow in Verbier, Switzerland, after triggering an avalanche

programme.title: On Benefits & Proud
programme.desc: Documentary examining the lifestyles of some of those living on benefits who are not currently seeking employment, including a Gloucestershire mother-of-11 who receives benefits equivalent to three times the typical UK family income. Also featured are a Liverpool couple who have not worked for six years, and two single mums in Camden whose rents are more than Â£1,200 a month each and are paid by the state

programme.title: The Big Benefits Row
programme.desc: A panel discusses the UK's welfare system and why the subject has become such a political hot potato, with questions and contributions by a studio audience. Topics covered include whether the process is being abused and if it should be made harder for the long-term unemployed and recent immigrants to claim benefits

programme.title: Fat for Cash
programme.desc: Documentary about three American women making money by tapping into the market for men who prefer the larger form. Jen from Boston weighs 30st and is deliberately piling on the pounds to bring in the dollars, selling movies in which she lowers herself onto men's chests as they lay on her specially reinforced bed. Former supersize model Sammee has launched a pole-dancing club night in Las Vegas called Thick Sundaes, while 40st Christina is starting her own subscription website

programme.title: Justified
programme.desc: Raylan's search for Drew Thompson leads him to re-interview the woman who discovered Thompson's bag, and she reveals information that sends the marshal to the wild Kentucky hills. Meanwhile, having been given the slip by Ellen May, Colt tries to finish the job he started. Crime drama, starring Timothy Olyphant and Ron Eldard

programme.title: Dark Blue
programme.desc: A car belonging to a law student with a debt at the local casino is found splattered with his blood, prompting the team to investigate his disappearance. The trail leads to dangerous loan shark Tim Rowe, who Jaimie tries to trap. As it becomes apparent her safety is in jeopardy, Alex and Carter focus their attention on the gambling facility's floor supervisor in the hope he can secure evidence implicating Rowe

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: Casey must confront his former karate mentor, who has become a rogue agent. Emmett's latest initiative causes chaos at Buy More, while Ellie meets Awesome's parents - who have very strong ideas about the direction their wedding should take. Guest starring Carl Lumbly (Alias), Bruce Boxleitner (Tron, Babylon 5) and Morgan Fairchild

programme.title: Committed (2011)
programme.desc: A psychologist recovering from the death of her fiance takes a job working at her mentor's unconventional mental institution. Soon after arriving, she discovers she is officially a patient, not a staff member - and a series of strange events makes her fear she is actually going mad. Thriller, starring Andrea Roth and Richard Burgi

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Horatio and his colleagues investigate a youngster's abduction and find themselves drawn into a dangerous situation at a jeweller's shop while trying to track down the kidnappers. A gun battle ensues - and a member of the team is killed in the line of duty

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mac, Stella and Lindsay discover a link between the deaths of a tram driver and a dancer who recently won the lottery. Meanwhile, Danny and Hawkes investigate the murder of a fish merchant and are led to a jealous friend who is resentful that his child was refused entry to a prestigious school

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A man convicted of murder and rape is released from jail because of faulty DNA evidence and subsequently killed, prompting Jane and the team to investigate his death. However, it soon becomes apparent that more than one person wanted revenge on him. Guest starring Jack Coleman (Heroes), with Simon Baker and Robin Tunney

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green are assigned to investigate the execution-style killing of a prominent businessman, and discover his wife was having an affair. However, further evidence emerges, suggesting a different motive - and an unlikely conspirator. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Horatio and the team try to find the gang members responsible for a shoot-out in a hospital emergency room. Their inquiries lead them to discover that an unfaithful girlfriend, rather than rival-related retaliation, may be behind the incident. David Caruso, Emily Procter and Adam Rodriguez star

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A roller derby star is killed during a game, but it is unclear which side the culprit belongs to. Meanwhile, an author is found dead with the final chapter of his novel scrawled all over his body, leading the detectives to conclude he may have suffered from a compulsive urge to write. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Armed robbers break into the apartment of lawyer Roland Carson and make off in a helicopter with jewels worth more than $5million. The detectives investigate and, as people who have come into contact with the gems start to turn up dead, they suspect Carson could have staged the whole affair and killed his accomplices to cover his tracks. Drama, starring Gary Sinise and Carmine Giovinazzo

programme.title: Snatch (2000)
programme.desc: An unlicensed boxing promoter and his dim-witted sidekick convince an Irish gypsy to step in for their injured fighter, but find themselves drawn into a match-fixing racket. Meanwhile, the loot from a diamond heist goes missing, leading to a bloody conflict between Russian gangsters and a Jewish mob. Guy Ritchie's comedy drama, with Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Benicio Del Toro and Stephen Graham

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A discrepancy at the murder scene of an 18-year-old woman implicates assistant district attorney Craig Hansen in a different crime. Stella interrupts a bail hearing to arrest him, but her intervention results in a suspected killer being released back onto the streets. Crime drama, starring Melina Kanakaredes

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: The spy is intrigued to discover Sarah has a date at a restaurant with a mysterious man, but panics when the Intersect reveals her companion has a very shady past - and is stunned to learn the man is her father Jack. Beckman also takes an interest when she hears Jack has recently conned a sheik suspected of funding terrorism, and arranges for him to join the team on a mission to find out more about his activities. Meanwhile, Morgan makes an ill-advised purchase. Guest starring Gary Cole (Office Space)

programme.title: Seventeen and Missing (2006)
programme.desc: A mother with clairvoyant abilities is distraught when her teenage daughter goes missing. She finds herself plagued by traumatic visions of the girl's abduction, which might provide the vital clue to rescuing her, and turns to her estranged husband for help in tracking down their child. Thriller, starring Dedee Pfeiffer, Matthew Harrison and Tegan Moss

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A man arrested for a shooting decides to represent himself in court - and proves to be far more formidable than expected. Horatio realises the only thing that can put him behind bars is the eyewitness testimony of the victim's son, but is reluctant to put the boy on the stand

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mac, Danny, Flack and Lindsay investigate the case of a middle-aged tycoon killed in a lift, and discover a world in which girls meet much older men for sexual encounters. Stella and Hawkes uncover the identity of a body found in Central Park, learning the victim had been living a double life which ultimately led to his death. Drama, starring Gary Sinise

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The case of a murdered jockey leads Jane and the team into the murky underworld of horse racing, where they uncover a number of suspects. Crime drama, guest starring Jim Beaver (Deadwood) and Olesya Rulin (High School Musical), with Simon Baker and Robin Tunney

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green look into the shooting of defence lawyer Vance Grodie, who had just won an acquittal for a suspected cop killer. Their investigations reveal a link to a network of conservative extremists, and the discovery leads the case into an examination of civil rights. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A patrolman is murdered during a routine traffic stop, and Horatio and the team discover the vehicle used during the crime was driven by a 16-year-old student. She denies being involved in the killing and immediately implicates someone else, but tests on the recovered murder weapon suggest she is lying. Her mother continues to defend her daughter, until events take a dramatic turn

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A model collapses and dies on the catwalk during a fashion show - and it is not long before a second body is found in the cargo area just outside the venue. Meanwhile, a terminally ill patient claims he killed his doctor - but Stella and Flack realise his story cannot be true. Drama, starring Melina Kanakaredes, Eddie Cahill and Hill Harper

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The drama about an NYPD team specialising in sexual crimes returns. Mackenzie Burton disappears from her family home while her mother Pam is taking a bath and when Benson and Stabler investigate, they can find no sign of forced entry. The girl's father tells them that Mackenzie was adopted and also reveals that he and his wife's biological daughter Ella was abducted 10 years previously - a case that remains unsolved. Guest starring Joan Cusack, Peter Strauss and Ian Henry Cusick

programme.title: Played
programme.desc: A high-end litigator at a downtown law office goes missing, and his colleague believes that the firm's partners, specialists in corporate crime, are involved. Moreland cosies up to the managing partner Christopher Locke, and engages the whistle-blower in a dangerous sting operation to find the truth

programme.title: Longmire
programme.desc: Walt searches for a missing Native American boy who has been fostered by a white family, and suspects the child's birth parents may have abducted him

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mac and Danny investigate the mysterious death of a man torn apart by tigers at the Bronx Zoo. They are led to both the victim's meat-packing plant as well as his Mafia relatives. Hawkes and Stella take on the case of a debutante found dead on a carousel only hours before her big night. Drama, starring Melina Kanakaredes, Gary Sinise, Hill Harper and Carmine Giovinazzo

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: The Green Berets (1968)
programme.desc: A US Army colonel heads two squads of crack soldiers on a mission in the jungles of Vietnam, where they have to construct a camp to withstand attack and kidnap an enemy general. Accompanying him is a sceptical reporter, who questions the validity of the war. Military adventure, starring John Wayne, David Janssen, Jim Hutton and Aldo Ray

programme.title: Any Which Way You Can (1980)
programme.desc: Street-fighting trucker Philo Beddoe and his faithful orang-utan Clyde are targeted by the Mafia, who want to cash in on Philo's potential as a money-making brawler. However, they first have to kidnap him before they can persuade him to go along with their plans. Comedy sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Sondra Locke, Geoffrey Lewis, Harry Guardino and Ruth Gordon

programme.title: Fighter Attack (1953)
programme.desc: An American pilot returns to Italy after the Second World War and tells a priest the story of his last mission. He reveals how he was shot down in German occupied territory, but received help from a band of Partisan guerillas who helped him to free a captive friend and escape back to their own lines. Drama, starring Sterling Hayden and J Carrol Naish

programme.title: Man of the West (1958)
programme.desc: Reformed outlaw Link is left stranded in the wilderness with a saloon singer and a conman for company when the train they are travelling on is robbed. By chance they stumble upon Link's old gang holed up in a shack, but his former partners in crime threaten violence against them unless Link agrees to take part in a bank robbery. Western, starring Gary Cooper, Lee J Cobb, Julie London and Arthur O'Connell

programme.title: The Specialist (1994)
programme.desc: An explosives expert is reluctantly persuaded out of retirement by the charms of a vengeful woman bent on destroying the gang that murdered her parents. He carries out a series of assassinations with expert precision, but finds himself caught in a deadly game of cat and mouse when one of his targets hires a former colleague to track him down. Action thriller, starring Sylvester Stallone, Sharon Stone, James Woods, Rod Steiger and Eric Roberts

programme.title: Passenger 57 (1992)
programme.desc: After his wife is shot dead during a robbery, a cop hands in his badge and takes up a job offer from an old friend to be a security adviser for a major transatlantic airline. On the flight taking him to his new employers in Los Angeles is an international terrorist being escorted to trial by the FBI - while the prisoner's accomplices are disguised as passengers and crew and plan to hijack the plane. Action thriller, with Wesley Snipes, Bruce Payne, Tom Sizemore, Alex Datcher, Bruce Greenwood and Elizabeth Hurley

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane accepts the help of local astrologer Ellis Mars to solve the case of a triple murder involving two police officers. John Billingsley (True Blood) guest stars in an edition of the crime drama directed by leading actor Simon Baker. With Robin Tunney and Owain Yeoman

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The CBI tries to solve the murder of a Santa Claus impersonator, and Jane is questioned by an independent investigator in connection with the death of cop-killer Todd Johnson, who was set on fire while in police custody. Drama, starring Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Owain Yeoman and Amanda Righetti

programme.title: Played
programme.desc: A high-end litigator at a downtown law office goes missing, and his colleague believes that the firm's partners, specialists in corporate crime, are involved. Moreland cosies up to the managing partner Christopher Locke, and engages the whistle-blower in a dangerous sting operation to find the truth

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The agents investigate the Halloween murder of a marine with a fondness for playing practical jokes. As the evidence accumulates, they begin to suspect he was killed by the exasperated victim of one of his pranks. Drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Cedar Cove
programme.desc: New series. Drama following the fortunes of Olivia Lockhart, a small-town judge, both inside and away from the courtroom. As the tale gets under way, Olivia considers a career move that could cost her a new romance, and force her to leave behind the home she has come to love

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The team finds a corpse that appears to have been eaten by a large snake. When the serpent later shows up dead, the autopsy reveals drugs were being transported inside its body - and the trail leads to an old enemy of Horatio's who previously escaped justice owing to diplomatic immunity. Meanwhile, Wolfe is asked to investigate a theft, but stumbles on a case of identity fraud

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A jet carrying a fortune in bank funds crashes into a residential area, killing everyone on board. Horatio investigates, and begins to suspect sabotage - a theory reinforced by the discovery that one of the passengers was already dead when the tragedy occurred. Guest starring Michael Landes

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A billionaire playboy and his date are shot by a bowman during a party celebrating a local artist, leaving the girl dead, the host in shock - and detectives unsure which of the pair was the target. Meanwhile, a music promoter is found murdered with posters promoting his new band glued to his body - and flyers for a rival group on a nearby wall. Gary Sinise and Melina Kanakaredes star

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The body of 19-year-old Ethan Grohl is discovered on the Brooklyn Bridge and the detectives find an envelope in his backpack containing photographs of a young woman who appears to be dead. Further inquiries lead the team to San Francisco, with Jo inviting her old flame FBI Agent Cade Conover along to help. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise and Sela Ward

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Nick and Catherine investigate the case of a man beaten and sexually assaulted in an alleyway. Meanwhile, Langston and the team respond to a fatal shooting at an electronics store, only to discover the victim is the rapist being sought by their colleagues. To complicate matters, three people step forward to confess to his murder

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A man is garrotted beside a hotel pool surrounded by dozens of other sun-worshippers, yet none of them witnesses the attack because the killer struck during a solar eclipse, when all eyes were trained on the sky. Even more baffling, the first DNA evidence suggests a human-wolf mutation was present at the time of the attack

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia

programme.title: Let's Make a Deal
programme.desc: An update of the classic game show in which contestants wearing outrageous costumes make deals with the host to win money and prizes

programme.title: The Price Is Right
programme.desc: 'Come on down!' Contestants guess retail values for prizes on TV's longest-running game show. Bob Barker racked up over a dozen hosting Emmys since CBS first aired the daytime staple in 1972, though it originated with Bill Cullen on NBC (1956-63) and ABC (1963-65). However, it was the genial, ageless Barker who really sold viewers on the show, which spawned several syndicated offshoots and a string of prime-time specials. When Barker retired in 2007, Drew Carey stepped in to ably fill his shoes

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful
programme.desc: The high-glam soap about L.A.'s fashionable and fertile Forrester clan was designed as a sister soap to the popular 'The Young and the Restless,' and quickly won ratings and global fans with cast crossovers, exotic remotes, glossy runaway shows and fast-paced storylines about beautiful people behaving badly. In 2004, the show introduced a new family, the Marones, and recruited several nighttime alums to beef up the cast. And to create a little chaos

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Creator-producer Merv Griffin's classic game-show version of `hangman' has kept on spinning for three decades. The money and prizes have gotten bigger over the years, but the basic format and difficulty of the mystery phrases have pretty much remained steady. Another series constant has been the nation's premier (and most fashionably dressed) letter-turner, Vanna White, who parlayed the gig into a bestselling 1987 autobiography. As for host Pat Sajak, he has won three Emmys for the series

programme.desc: Phil tries to teach Luke a lesson in responsibility; Mitchell and Cameron sign Lily up for Mommy & Me class; Jay and Manny take time out for a father-and-son bonding experiment

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire's memory is tested by a visit from an old friend (Minnie Driver); Mitchell gives Gloria legal advice; Jay's racquetball game with Cameron is marred by an uncomfortable encounter in the locker room

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Via Facebook, Phil invites an old girlfriend (Judy Greer) to stop by the Dunphys for a visit; Jay invents an alibi after he accidentally kills Manny's pet turtle; Mitchell takes a stand at work

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Gloria surprises Jay for his birthday with a trip to Hawaii, but it's the gift that keeps on giving at the airport when the entire Pritchett clan is invited to come along

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay's plans for rest and relaxation on the family's Hawaiian vacation are rudely interrupted. Meanwhile, Mitchell and Cameron have opposing views on sightseeing; Phil tries to make it a trip to remember for Claire; and the kids get mischievous without adult supervision

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Claire's alter egos, Clive and Juliana, reunite for Valentine's Day, but their rendezvous puts Claire in the hospital. Meanwhile, Jay and Gloria's romantic evening is marred by the kids' interruptions; and Mitchell and Cameron throw a wild party that leaves them wondering what happened the night before and why Dylan is their new housemate

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: The carefree life of a superstar quarterback and confirmed bachelor (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson) is disrupted when he discovers that he has an 8-year-old daughter (Madison Pettis). Passable fluff, but Johnson and Pettis display a winning chemistry. Kyra Sedgwick. Directed by Andy Fickman

programme.title: WWE A.M. Raw
programme.desc: Wwe A.M. Raw

programme.title: House
programme.desc: When a man in a wheelchair who fainted while crossing a street arrives at the hospital, House tells the 10 remaining candidates to divide themselves into teams. The one that diagnoses the man properly won't be fired. They split up based on gender, but one woman (Anne Dudek) opts to join the men. Meanwhile, a patient sticks a knife into a wall socket for reasons that intrigue House; and Foreman's new diagnostic team at Mercy Hospital in Manhattan faces a tough case

programme.title: House
programme.desc: While having a seizure, a funeral-home cosmetician (Azura Skye) hallucinates that she's being assaulted by one of the corpses she's working on. And later, in the hospital, she acts as though her dead mother is in the room with her. Meanwhile, Cameron offers advice to one of the seven candidates for House's team; and Cuddy hires Foreman back

programme.title: House
programme.desc: A mugging victim with amnesia apes people around him. He also has a protein abnormality that's turning his blood to “sludge.” Meanwhile, Cuddy assigns her latest hire to be her “eyes and ears” on House's team, displeasing House considerably; and doctors around the hospital (candidates included) are betting on House's hiring decision

programme.title: House
programme.desc: When a teen collapses with severe pelvic pain after playing basketball, tests reveal both male and female DNA. The parents knew this, but not the youngster. Meanwhile, Cuddy and Wilson suspect something is wrong with House when he begins acting nicely

programme.title: House
programme.desc: A 16-year-old car-crash victim is insensitive to pain. She's also very headstrong, and concerned about her mother, who was injured more seriously in the crash. Perhaps not surprisingly, House takes a particular interest in the girl. He also takes an interest in Cuddy's date with a man she met online and keeps finding ways to interrupt it. And Foreman's girlfriend, Nurse Wendy, has a Valentine's Day getaway planned for the two of them

programme.title: Barclays Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Tottenham vs. Everton

programme.title: Barclays Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Manchester United vs. Fulham

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a rape that occurred during the opening festivities of a luxury hotel. Beau Miller: Bill Winkler. Siobhan Miller: Jenna Lamia. Desk Clerk Wilde: Tim Hopper. Russell Ramsay: Derek Cecil. Patty Ann Miller: Nealy Glenn. Munch: Richard Belzer. Benson: Mariska Hargitay. Stabler: Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Stabler breaks the rules to uncover the facts when a student (Brittany Slattery) claims that she was assaulted by a teacher. Ross McKenzie: Christopher Orr. Tommy Kessler: Billy Kay. Nick Radsen: Jason Fuchs. Amy Bergen: Elena Franklin. Mia Kessler: Spraque Grayden. Principal Charest: William Charlton. Munch: Richard Belzer. Benson: Mariska Hargitay. Stabler: Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives attempt to track down an extremely dangerous sex offender (Lou Diamond Phillips) who has kidnapped two children after brutally murdering their mother, stepfather and older sister

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After a mob lawyer (Cary Elwes) is attacked and his wife brutally murdered, Benson and Stabler question their daughter. But her wild night of drunken partying leaves her unable to recall her actions, even though her father insists she was at the scene of the crime. Also, Stabler is charged with excessive force. Charlotte: Emily VanCamp. Ryan: Justin Klosky

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Stabler becomes involved in a murder case that leads to revelations of infidelity and obsession among a group of friends, one of whom is the victim's husband (Chris Sarandon). Also, Stabler learns that Benson is back in town and asks for her help in the investigation. Glenn: Bob Saget. Naomi: Catherine Bell. Stella Danquiss: Bernadette Peters

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson are at odds over whom to believe in a “he said, she said” rape case involving a husband and wife (Blair Underwood, Michael Michele) in the middle of an extremely bitter child-custody dispute. Tessa: Tiffany Evans. Kathy: Isabel Gillies. Eriq La Salle directed

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A graduate student (Shannyn Sossamon) claims that she was raped by an advisor (Billy Campbell). Donna Emmett: Viola Davis. Lorna Scarry: Mariette Hartley. Elizabeth Donnelly: Judith Light. Sophie Polikoff: Carolyn Miller. Benson: Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The hunt for a serial rapist is complicated by the fact that one victim is a schizophrenic (Amanda Plummer). Dr. Rebecca Hendrix: Mary Stuart Masterson. Thomas: Dallas Roberts. Colleen Heaton: Trieste Dunn. Alan Richter: Ward Horton. Mrs. Mathers: Angela Pietropinto. Benson: Mariska Hargitay. Stabler: Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A case of child abuse is discovered after a little girl (Jennette McCurdy) is examined following an auto accident. Mark Dobbins: Daniel Hugh Kelly. Julie Dobbins: Rebecca Lowman. Larry Purcell: David Lansbury. Sonya Purcell: Pamela Holden Stewart. Kevin Wilcox: Zach Gilford

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An ADA (Sharon Stone) who is Stabler's ex-partner requests that he and Benson investigate a case involving a father accused of murdering his two young daughters in a fire. Stabler then resorts to some problematic methods of interrogation

programme.desc: Gus falls for a sexy private eye while investigating a man whose life mirrors his own
